title: "Artificial Intelligence Enables Microrobots To Swim And Navigate"
excerpt: "Researchers of Santa Clara University, New Jersey Institute of Technology, and the University of Hong Kong have successfully used Deep Reinforcement Learning to teach microrobots how to swim, which represents a significant advancement in the field of micro swimming."
